channel.title: Java on Grid Side
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Grid Side

item.title: Amazone Same Day Delivery Application
item.description:
● A swing application was developed to provide a solution for same day product delivery on Netbeans in Java.

● Followed the object oriented design principles and supported features including distributed virtual local suppliers, order processing, billing, invoicing, shipment and return management etc.

● DB4O is used for data persistence.

@Github https://github.com/sleephu/A-Swing-project--Amazon-Same-Day-Delivery

item.title: E-Commerce Web Platform for Restaurants
item.description:
● A C2C web application was developed for restaurants in Java in Eclipse.

● The features include registration, login, restaurants search feature, menu viewing, order processing and reservation etc.

● Designed and implemented data model in MySQL, and used hibernate as ORM for persistence.

● Technologies used: Spring MVC framework, Hibernate, and Spring Security were used. jQuery, and Bootstrap framework were used on the client side

@Github: https://github.com/sleephu/spring-MVC-project
